question:
The jurisdiction of Central Administrative Tribunal (CAT) extends to which of the following?
1. All-India services
2. Central civil services
3. Members of the defence forces
4. Civil posts under the Centre
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The jurisdiction of Central Administrative Tribunal (CAT) extends to the all-India services, the Central civil services, civil posts under the Centre and civilian employees of defence services. It does not cover the defence forces, officers and servants of the Supreme Court and the secretarial staff of the Parliament.
